bio: I am a full stack software engineer with an affinity for user interface design and front-end web development. I'm driven by the desire to learn new things, try new technologies, and solve problems. My passions include listening to music, engaging with design, playing video games, and coding.
education: I graduated with Magna Cum Laude honors from the University of South Florida (Tampa, FL) on August 2016, where I received my Bachelor of Science in Computer Science degree. During my time as a student, I participated in several programming workshops hosted by the MSDN@USF club and furthered my understanding of computer science by taking additional online courses on edX.
